description: Generate rEFInd manual boot stanzas from Btrfs snapshots
info:
mount /dev/xxx /mnt
btrfs subvolume set-default 5 /mnt 
btrfs subvolume get-default /mnt
refind looks for the kernel/initramfs relative to the default subvolume
if it's not set to top level (5) it can't load the kernels from @snapshots subvolume
